title: Full day to Paracas & Huacachina from Lima with Ballestas island & Sand boarding
description: Paracas is a favored weekend getaway for Limeños but even if you have only a day to spare, you can enjoy its highlights on this guided tour from Lima. You'll sail to the Ballestas Islands to see marine wildlife including penguins and sea lions; go sand boarding on the dunes of Huacachina, and enjoy some wine and Pisco-tasting at a local vineyard.
all_descriptions: Paracas is a favored weekend getaway for Limeños but even if you have only a day to spare, you can enjoy its highlights on this guided tour from Lima. You'll sail to the Ballestas Islands to see marine wildlife including penguins and sea lions; go sand boarding on the dunes of Huacachina, and enjoy some wine and Pisco-tasting at a local vineyard.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Islas Ballestas, Paracas 11660 PeruWe baord the boat to visit the Ballesta island.Duration: 2 hoursStop At:Huacachina, Huacachina, Ica RegionWe do the tour of the buggie and sandboarding and walk around the lagoon. It is included in the priceDuration: 45 minutesStop At:El Catador Bodega Turistica, Fundo Tres Esquinas 102, Ica 11000 PeruWe visit this wineyard to taste some wine and pisco.Duration: 1 hour

reviews.title: Amazing Day Trip with Friends
reviews.text: I went on the full-day trip to Paracas and Huacachina with my friends, and it was one of the best tours we’ve done in Peru. The boat ride to Ballestas Island was exciting, and we got to see so much wildlife. Later, the sandboarding and dune buggy ride in Huacachina were unforgettable full of fun and adventure. The trip was well organized, the guide was helpful, and it was a perfect day to enjoy with friends.

reviews.title: A nice surprise
reviews.text: Great tour! We came with no expectations, but it was actually really great and a good deal for the money.The guide was nice and really flexible with schedule and we got time to enjoy every part of the tour!The degustacion which was some random extra activity which we didn't care much about, revealed itself to be actually one of the highlight of the trip, with great explainations and many nice tastings.Totally recommended

reviews.title: Never again
reviews.text: i think this trip can t be improved..all in all a Desaster when you compare the price with the experience...30 second Photostop at huachina..almost 9 hours of driving and 2 hours waiting timeIn my Personal top 3 of the worst Trip ever done

reviews.title: Perfect 1 day out of Lima
reviews.text: The tour was well paced. Transportation was comfortable and timely. We had enough time in each stops and we were blessed with good weather so no big waves  while in Paracas and it was tolerable in the Desert. Had a great lunch and Pisco tasting in Ica.

reviews.title: Had a great experience!
reviews.text: I decided to take this tour just the afternoon before and grateful I made that decision. It was the cheapest tour I could find and I got more out than I would have expected. Everyone was super helpful and even tho I booked on short notice I got picked up from my hotel. The places we visited were simply amazing. We had a 90 minute boat ride were we saw penguins, sea lions and the nasca lines. Afterwards we visited Huacachina and had an amazing 2 hours Buggy ride in the gorgeous desert, including sandboarding. Our guide was great, super friendly, did a lot of explanations and helped wherever he could.The restaurants were we stopped were all carefully picked and affordable, from the tiny roadside breakfast place with freshly made typical Peruvian breads, to the lunch place where we got a short wine tour, including free samples. I had an amazing day and can totally recommend to take this tour!

reviews.title: ATTENSION: DO NOT JOIN THIS TOUR, TERRIBALE SERVICE, UNPROFESSIONAL
reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!After paid and confirmation from viatour, we waited for our hotel pick up time from the tour company. no communication whatsoever, then we tried to call, dirctly to voice mail. Tour day, we waited at hotel lobby at 4:45am, then we have got call at 5:15am from tour company, that our tour has been canceled due to inefficent people join.They offer us to pay extra 30US dollar per person for a private tour.THIS IS NOT A TOUR COMPANY, THEY ARE FRAUD, LEAVE YOU TO THE LAST MINUTE,  GIVE YOU NO CHOICE THEN ASK YOU FOR MORE MONEY.If you read my review and still join this tour, good luck my friend, to prepare for your miserable and unperfesional service.

reviews.title: Don’t understand the importance from a tourist visiting in.
reviews.text: As a tourist we plan our visit to the country in a schedule time. Unfortunately this tour was cancelled at the last minute by the tour company due other people from the tour group have got sick, we understand and we are sorry that the others couldn’t attend the tour but that is not our problem and we were ready to go. The tour company cancelled and suggest us to pay extra $35 each if we still want to attend the tour, meaning they would be able to do the tour but they won’t because others won’t attend which we think is unfair. Although We tried to negotiate paying for one the extra charge and attending two which they denied and cancelled the tour, disregarding us totally and not seeing our point of view as a tourist. We are very disappointed the way we were treated.

reviews.title: Great and social trip
reviews.text: This is a really well-organised and intensive trip!We visit the islands outside of Paracas, the desert in Huacachina and Pisco-destillery in the end.It is a day-trip from Lima, which means that it is possible to explore a lot in a limited time.The guiding is very good, and the guests are an international mix, making it possible to make new friends. The trip is done by a minibus, so the group size is also not too largeThe trip lasts a long time. We left the hotel at 5am and was back at 10pm, so I recommend to bring a bag with things that you could possible need for a long day by the seaside and in the desert
